author: mmusich
body:
Title says it all:
   * Run `hltPhase2UpgradeIntegrationTests` in IB, fe7c0213a9adfaf4fca11cefd9abf07e19544887
   * add option to run hlt p2 integration script for PRs, a7fba11bfad0785f7c98d697d067ef7dd9206094
   
I didn't really test any of this, I am particularly unsure about the second bullet, which is largely based on https://github.com/cms-sw/cms-bot/pull/2240.
title: Run `hltPhase2UpgradeIntegrationTests` in IB, add option to run hlt p2 integration script for PRs
